loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu rubuga rw'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho agaciro k'amahame rusange ya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kugenekereza niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe agakono k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe w'iporogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha kuri imeyili ku byabaye muri sisitemu biteganyijwe mu minsi iri imbere.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiyongereyeho nko kohereza muri PDF/Excel, igenamiterere rirambuye rya raporo, n'imenyesha rya SMS/imeyili biteganyijwe mu minsi iri imbere. Kohereza muri CSV guhari ubu ni ukubona amakuru y'ibanze.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme éducative intelligente pour gérer les notes des élèves, la présence, et la communication avec les parents — facilitant et rendant plus efficace le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Andika kandi ubike amanota y'abanyeshuri mu buryo buboneye.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Menyesha ababyeyi amanota n'andi makuru ukoresheje SMS cyangwa imeyili.
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Kurikirana imyitwarire y'abanyeshuri n'imijyiye yabo ku ishuri.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Tanga kandi ukurikirane imikoro n'indi mirimo y'abanyeshuri.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika amafoto y'abanyeshuri n'izindi nyandiko zikenewe mu mutekano.
featureCommunicationDesc: Koroshya itumanaho hagati y'abarimu n'ubuyobozi bw'ishuri.
feedbackPageDescription: Ibitekerezo byanyu ni ingenzi! Dusangize ibyifuzo cyangwa ibibazo mufite.
feedbackSubmittedDesc: Murakoze ku gitekerezo cyanyu! Twishimiye ko mwafashe umwanya.
feedbackSubmissionFailedDesc: Ntibyakunze kwohereza igitekerezo. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
registerSchoolPageDescription: Fungura konti y'ikigo cyawe utangire gucunga raporo z'abanyeshuri.
schoolRegistrationSuccessDesc: {schoolName} na konti y'umuyobozi wayo byakozwe. Nyamuneka injira.
errorUnexpected: Habaye ikibazo kitateguwe. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.
errorEmailInUse: Iyi meyili isanzwe ikoreshwa n'indi konti.
errorWeakPassword: Ijambobanga ni rigufi cyane. Rigomba kuba rifite nibura inyuguti 6.
